sourcesContent:
import{ Component, Input, ChangeDetectionStrategy} from '@angular/core'; import { Character } from 'src/app/shared/components/interfaces/character.interface'; @Component({ selector: 'app-character', template: `

{{character.name | slice:0:15}}

 {{character.status}} - {{character.species}} {{character.status}} - {{character.species}}

{{character.gender}}

{{character.created | date}}
`, changeDetection:ChangeDetectionStrategy.OnPush }) export class CharacterComponent{ @Input()character!:Character; }
